grading_system.description: Unable to verify the specific grading or scoring system used for food facility inspections

inspection_details.frequency: Risk-based inspections with B&B facilities serving full breakfast requiring at least twice annually
inspection_details.public_disclosure: Inspection reports must be maintained on-site and made available for public review upon request

fire_safety_authority.ansul_system_requirements: Semi-annual inspections per NFPA 96 standards (industry standard)
fire_safety_authority.inspection_frequency: Semi-annual for commercial kitchen hood fire suppression systems

regulatory_framework.food_code_basis: California Retail Food Code (CRFC) - California Health and Safety Code Division 104, Part 7
regulatory_framework.state_vs_local_authority: County-level inspections conducted by Environmental Health Division
regulatory_framework.local_ordinances: Mariposa County specific requirements for B&Bs, cottage food operations, and catering operations

confidence_notes: Could not locate specific grading system information on official website or documents. Found general inspection program information but no scoring methodology.
verification_notes: Need to contact Mariposa County Environmental Health Division directly to determine specific grading methodology, inspection scoring system, risk categorization details, and whether inspection results are published online.
